name: Briber
description: Briber. Checks if all punks provided are owned by an address and pays miner, or reverts.

functionDecorators.name: verifyPunkOwnershipAndPay
functionDecorators.description: Verifies ownership of punks and pays bribeParam: {address} _owner expected owner of punksParam: {uint256[]} _punkIds expected punks to have owned.
